name: Oleksandr Halushko
bio: I like C++ for the power it puts in the hands of the developer and I believe that mastering a powerful and versatile tool craftsman grows

name: Alexios Lyrakis
bio: Until now I have worked mainly with C. However, through my master in Embedded Systems I discovered the power of C++. I love the power and the flexibility of this language.

name: Ann TV Huynh
bio: I worked with C++ during my first job as a developer 4 years ago and continued to use it in my scientific thesis. I love the power of this language and want to further refine my mastery over its various uses.
